Articles.Content:
Hi there,

Been playing for quite a while now but have been giving the career mode a proper go lately.

I have read throughout the forums and the internet that satellite missions are the best way to earn good money, which I am in need of. The only problem is that I just don't seem to get any of the satellite missions. I understand that I need to have unlocked solar panels which I have done (the first one's on the lower tech level) but cant see anything anywhere that says I need to have anything else unlocked.

Can anyone help?

Thanks in advance.

Stitch

Roll of the dice.

Do a few of them mission in your mission control list (or fast forward a week) and satellite contracts should show up eventually.
Well, satellite missions are also a privilege that you earn from having a high reputation. Which you earn by doing a handful of the stupid contracts. Your rep needs to be over 300, AFAIK.
